thread.title: Rumor: 4-star QB Seth Green, Oregon Ducks part ways
thread.title_full: Rumor: 4-star QB Seth Green, Oregon Ducks part ways | OregonLive.com

author: Andrew Nemec | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Rumor: 4-star QB Seth Green, Oregon Ducks part ways
text:
When Sheldon High School quarterback Justin Herbert was told Thursday that he was being offered a scholarship by Oregon Ducks football coach Mark Helfrich, the 6-foot-5, 215-pound signal-caller didn't even blink before committing .
On paper, that would appear to give Oregon three quarterbacks in the class of 2016, as four-star prospects Seth Green and Terry Wilson are already in the fold.
However, after a week of speculation that Green was wavering , Herbert said he was informed that Green was no longer committed to the program.
"I've been told he de-committed," Herbert explained.
The decision appears to be the latest in a tumultuous senior season for Green, who moved from East Ridge High School (Minnesota) to powerhouse Allen High School in Texas over the summer and has spent the fall primarily as a back-up .
Last week, the 6-foot-4, 210-pound signal-caller removed his Twitter information stating that he was an Oregon pledge, but denied that he had formally de-committed from the program.
Regardless of who initiated the change, Oregon and Green appear to have parted ways, as the Ducks have moved on to Herbert and are unlikely to bring in three scholarship quarterbacks in one class.
Prior to his commitment, Green held offers from Michigan State, Minnesota and others.
Oregon currently has 13 known commitments in the class of 2016:
4* S Brady Breeze , 6-1, 200, Central Catholic HS (Portland, OR)
4* ATH La'Mar Winston , 6-2, 210, Central Catholic HS (Portland, OR)
4* CB Jared Mayden , 6-0, 195, Sachse High School (Sachse, TX)
3* TE Cam McCormick , 6-5, 235, Summit HS (Bend, OR)
3* OL Jacob Capra , 6-5, 270, Placer HS (Auburn, CA)
4* WR Dillon Mitchell , 6-1, 190, White Station HS (Memphis, TN)
4* QB Terry Wilson , 6-3, 190, Del City High School (Del City, OK)
3* OLB Hunter Kampmoyer , 6-4, 235, Bishop Union HS (Bishop, CA)
3* RB Vavae Malepeai , 6-0, 190, Mililani HS (Mililani, HI)
4* LB Darrian Franklin , 6-1, 215, Downey HS (Downey, CA)
3* OT Logan Bathke , 6-6, 260, Lutheran HS (Orange, CA)
3* LB/S Troy Dye , 6-3, 205, Norco High School (Norco, CA)
Unrated QB Justin Herbert , 6-5, 215, Sheldon High School (Eugene, OR)
-- Andrew Nemec
anemec@oregonian.com
